editor.label: Application server - IIS addwebsitebinding
editor.description: Adds a binding to a Website.

formElement.label: Website Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Website to add a binding, e.g.: 'Default Web Site'.

formElement.label: Binding Protocol:
formElement.documentation: Protocol of the binding to add.

formElement.label: Binding Information:
formElement.documentation: Information of the binding to add, including the host and the port, e.g.: 'localhost:443', '*:81'.

formElement.label: Host Header:
formElement.documentation: Host headers (also known as domain names or host names) let you assign more than one site to a single IP address on a Web server. E.g., myhost.com.
